registry.title: IS-IS TLV Codepoints
registry.note: For IS-IS registries and value ranges maintained via the "Expert Review" registration procedure, guidance for IESG-designated experts can be found in .

registry.title: IS-IS Top-Level TLV Codepoints
registry.description: Top-level TLVs for the IS-IS protocol
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg
registry.note: IETF SHALL keep JTC1/SC6 informed of TLV codepoint values allocated, and JTC1/SC6 SHALL refer allocation requests arising within JTC1 constituencies to the IANA registry process.
Codepoints greater than 255 can only be used in PDUs designated to support extended TLVs.

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-TLVs for Reverse Metric TLV
registry.description: Sub-TLVs for Reverse Metric TLV (16)
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-TLVs for TLVs Advertising Neighbor Information
registry.description:
This registry defines sub-TLVs for TLVs advertising neighbor information. The list of TLVs includes:
Extended IS reachability (22) IS Neighbor Attribute (23) L2 Bundle Member Attributes (25) inter-AS reachability information (141) MT-ISN (222) MT IS Neighbor Attribute (223)
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg
registry.note: Allocations within this registry require documentation of the use of the allocated value and approval by the Designated Expert assigned by the IESG.

The column for TLV 25 may be marked as follows:
y - sub-TLV may appear in TLV 25 but MUST NOT be shared by multiple L2 Bundle Members y(s) - sub-TLV may appear in TLV 25 and MAY be shared by multiple L2 Bundle Members n - sub-TLV MUST NOT appear in TLV 25

registry.title: IS-IS Neighbor Link-Attribute Bit Values
registry.description: This registry defines bit values for the Link-attributes sub-TLV (19) advertised in TLVs advertising neighbor information. These TLVs are listed in the description of the “IS-IS Sub-TLVs for TLVs Advertising Neighbor Information” registry.

record.name: Local Edge Enabled for Flooding (LEEF) (TEMPORARY - registered 2019-08-08, extension registered 2023-06-21, expires 2024-08-08)

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-TLVs for TLVs Advertising Prefix Reachability
registry.description:
This registry defines sub-TLVs for TLVs advertising prefix reachability. The list of TLVs includes:
SRv6 Locator (27) IPv4 Algorithm Prefix Reachability TLV (126) IPv6 Algorithm Prefix Reachability TLV (127) Extended IP reachability (135) MT IP Reach (235) IPv6 IP Reach (236) MT IPv6 IP Reach (237)
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg
registry.note: Allocations within this registry require documentation of the use of the allocated value and approval by the Designated Expert assigned by the IESG.

registry.title: IS-IS Bit Values for Prefix Attribute Flags Sub-TLV
registry.description: This registry defines bit values for the Prefix Attribute Flags (4) sub-TLV advertised in Prefix Reachability TLVs. These TLVs are listed in the description of the "IS-IS Sub-TLVs for TLVs Advertising Prefix Reachability” registry.
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS Group Address Type Codes for GADDR-TLV
registry.description: This registry defines Group Address Type Codes for the GADDR-TLV (142).
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-TLVs for MT-Port-Cap-TLV
registry.description: This registry defines sub-TLVs for the MT-Port-Cap-TLV (143).
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-TLVs for MT-Capability TLV
registry.description: This registry defines sub-TLVs for the MT-Capability TLV (144).
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-TLVs for IS-IS Router CAPABILITY TLV
registry.description: This registry defines sub-TLVs for the IS-IS Router CAPABILITY TLV (242).
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg
registry.note: Allocations within this registry require documentation of the use of the allocated value and approval by the Designated Expert assigned by the IESG.

record.description: Segment Routing Mapping Server Preference (SRMS Preference)

IS-IS Dynamic Flooding Sub-TLV (TEMPORARY - registered 2019-08-08, extension registered 2023-06-21, expires 2024-08-08)

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-Sub-TLVs for SRv6 Capabilities Sub-TLV
registry.description: This registry defines sub-sub-TLVs for the SRv6 Capabilities sub-TLV (25) advertised in the IS-IS Router CAPABILITY TLV (242).
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS SRv6 Capabilities Sub-TLV Flags
registry.description: This registry defines bit values advertised in the Flags field of the SRv6 Capabilities sub-TLV (25). This sub-TLV is advertised in the IS-IS Router CAPABILITY TLV (242).
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS Application Identifiers for Generic Information TLV
registry.description: This registry defines Application Identifiers for the Generic Information TLV (251).
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-Sub-TLVs for BIER Info Sub-TLV
registry.description: This registry defines sub-sub-TLV codes which may be advertised in the BIER Info sub-TLV, which is advertised in Prefix Reachability TLVs. These TLVs are listed in the description of the "IS-IS Sub-TLVs for TLVs Advertising Prefix Reachability” registry.
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-TLVs for Segment Identifier/Label Binding TLVs
registry.description:
This registry defines sub-TLVs for Segment Identifier/Label Binding TLVs. The list of TLVs includes:
Segment Identifier/Label Binding (149) Multi-Topology Segment Identifier/Label Binding (150)
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-Sub-TLV Codepoints for Application-Specific Link Attributes
registry.description: This registry defines sub-sub-TLV codepoints for the Application-Specific Link Attributes sub-TLV, which is advertised in TLVs advertising neighbor information. These TLVs are listed in the description of the “IS-IS Sub-TLVs for TLVs Advertising Neighbor Information” registry.
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg
registry.note: For future codepoints, in cases where the document that defines the encoding is different from the document that assigns the codepoint, the encoding reference MUST be to the document that defines the encoding.

If a link attribute can be advertised both as a sub-TLV of TLVs advertising neighbor information and as a sub-sub-TLV of the Application-Specific Link Attributes sub-TLV defined in , then the same numerical code should be assigned to the link attribute whenever possible.

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-TLVs for Application-Specific SRLG TLV
registry.description: This registry defines sub-TLVs for the Application-Specific SRLG TLV (TLV 238).
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg
registry.note: For future codepoints, in cases where the document that defines the encoding is different from the document that assigns the codepoint, the encoding reference MUST be to the document that defines the encoding.

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-Sub-TLVs for SRv6 SID Sub-TLVs
registry.description:
This registry defines sub-sub-TLVs for SRv6 SID sub-TLVs. This includes the following sub-TLVs:
SRv6 End SID (5) (Advertised in SRv6 Locator TLV (27)) SRv6 End.X SID (43) (Advertised in TLVs advertising neighbor information) SRv6 LAN End.X SID (44) (Advertised in TLVs advertising neighbor information)
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS SRv6 Locator TLV Flags
registry.description: This registry defines bit values advertised in the Flags field of the SRv6 Locator TLV (27).
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS SRv6 End SID Sub-TLV Flags
registry.description: This registry defines bit values advertised in the Flags field of the SRv6 End SID sub-TLV (5), which is advertised in the SRv6 Locator TLV (27).
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS SRv6 Adjacency SID Sub-TLVs Flags
registry.description:
This registry defines bit values advertised in the Flags field of SRv6 SID sub-TLVs associated with adjacencies. These sub-TLVs are advertised in TLVs advertising neighbor information. The list of sub-TLVs includes:
SRv6 End.X SID (43) SRv6 LAN End.X SID (44)
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-Sub-TLVs for Flexible Algorithm Definition Sub-TLV
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

IS-IS Exclude Maximum Delay (TEMPORARY - registered 2023-02-17, expires 2024-02-17)

registry.title: IS-IS Sub-Sub-TLVs for Flood Reflection Discovery Sub-TLV
registry.description: This registry contains assigned sub-sub-TLV identifiers for Flood Reflection Discovery purposes.
registry.expert: Chris Hopps, Hannes Gredler, Les Ginsberg

record.description: Flood Reflection Discovery Tunnel Encapsulation Attribute
